title: Recap: Tech falls in series finale to #7 Oklahoma State - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Recap: Tech falls in series finale to #7 Oklahoma State - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: STILLWATER, Okla. – Texas Tech (17-15, 0-3) dropped the series finale to seventh-ranked Oklahoma State (24-6, 3-0) by a score of 16-2 in five innings Sunday afternoon at Cowgirl Stadium in Stillwater.
